## A better way to send product emails
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/KFIO3cDTR2zDdUpGrwHpGOtQvM.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/KFIO3cDTR2zDdUpGrwHpGOtQvM.png)
### Build emails like never before
‚Äì
Ship faster with a powerful template builder that's tightly integrated with an email API.
‚Äì
Personalize emails with variables, conditionals, and loops ‚Äì without writing a line of code.
‚Äì
Emails automatically look great across devices and clients (yes, even Outlook).
### Land in inboxes, not spam
‚Äì
Send with confidence ‚Äì all emails are reliably delivered through world-class AWS infrastructure.
‚Äì
Scale on auto-pilot with intelligent warmup.
‚Äì
Every sender is manually reviewed by our team to prevent abuse and ensure high deliverability.

‚Äì
Access logs and events from our API or webhooks.

Hi**üëã** We‚Äôre Jordan and Carlos, the co-founders of Waypoint. Let's face it ‚Äì sending emails from software is still a pain. The traditional way of creating email templates quickly results in endless back-and-forths and bottlenecks between product, design, and engineering.
With Waypoint, teams can finally divide and conquer the workload. Designers can build templates visually, developers can send the right data, and the entire team can monitor deliverability. _Everyone can now focus on what they do best._
Waypoint is a focused service that doesn't try to do everything. It's strictly focused on product emails and it's a tool that we wish we had while building software in the past. 
We're now on a mission to help other software teams not deal with the same frustrations.

## Loved by developers
## Loved by developers
We believe the best developer experience is where devs don't have to worry about templates at all - just send data and empower others to do the rest on Waypoint. Start sending in minutes.
We believe the best developer experience is where devs don't have to worry about templates at all - just send data and empower others to do the rest on Waypoint. Start sending in minutes.
```
curl "https://live.waypointapi.com/v1/email_messages" \
 -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
 -u "API_KEY_USERNAME:API_KEY_PASSWORD" \
 -d '{
 "templateId": "wptemplate_ABc123XYZ",
 "to": "jordan@usewaypoint.com",
 "variables": {
  "user": {
   "displayName": "Jordan"
  },
  "product": {
   "title": "Beechers Mac & Cheese",
   "id": "02934203942"
  }
 }
}'
```
